snippet: Even a feud between two leading petroleum producers may not faze a world awash in cheap oil.
abstract: Oil prices close lower after early gains, despite feud between Iran and Saudi Arabia; world oil glut persists.
lead_paragraph: Even a feud between two leading petroleum producers may not faze a world awash in cheap oil.

headline.main: Oil Market Settles Lower, Taking Iran-Saudi Dispute in Stride
headline.print_headline: Oil Markets Settle Lower, Despite Iran-Saudi Feud
